tweet: Joined finally !! The last person on earth to join.  I am here with all the guns a-firin' . Better than myspace....facebook....we will see.
Getting ready to continue designing a wedding book for Jamie, one of my favorite brides.
Found out she is in the hospital for surgery too today. Prayers for a quick recovery.
Destination weddings are my favorite to photograph because it gets me out of this hot state !!
Thought about one of my favorite bands from the 70's, the Raspberries, gotta love youtube.
